This Summoning Enhancement heightens the intelligence of the target for six hours.
This Summoning Evocation opens a gate to fiery infernal pits - striking all enemies within range with gouts of flame.
This Summoning Enhancement calls upon the souls of their ancestors for knowledge - increasing the caster's lore skill.
This Summoning Curse weighs the target down with phantom chains - causing strength and dexterity loss for three hours.
This Summoning Enhancement increases the strength and dexterify of the target for six hours.
This Summoning Invocation summons a greater imp from another plane to serve the caster.
This Summoning Evocation creates an direct-damage aura about a single enemy that calls his or her blood to you - causing major harm.
This Summoning Evocation creates a bolt of pure energy to punish a single enemy.
